In a message dated 6/23/2001 8:15:45 PM Central Daylight Time, 
storey@... writes:

<< Sounds interesting (also sounds like the druid in the Diablo 2 expansion 
:),
 although sorcerors are associated more with mages so perhaps a different
 name is needed. >>

Yeah, I guess I'd have to agree with you there.  In fact, I did take some 
inspiration from Diablo 2 (awesome game too).  Another name does need to be 
come up with.  I also came up with another promotion idea, this one for the 
archer.  I'd call it the Ranger, which I think sounds nicely, only I don't 
have any ideas for specials.
